import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Footer from '../layout/Footer'; import Header from '../layout/Header'; import callApi from '../api/callApi'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { them_giohang } from '../../redux/cart'; import util from '../../util/util'; class Chitietsach extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { sach: [], _id: '', ten: '', hinh: '', gia: '', noidung: '', tentheloai: '', tentheloai: '', tennxb: '', cart:[], sachs:[], } } componentDidMount() { var { id } = this.props.params; console.log(this.data); if (id) { callApi(`api/sach/${id}`, 'GET', null).then(res => { var data = res.data; console.log(res) this.setState({ _id: data.sach._id, ten: data.sach.ten, hinh: data.sach.hinh, gia: data.sach.gia, noidung: data.sach.noidung, namxuatban: data.sach.namxuatban, tentheloai: data.sach.theloaisach.ten, tennxb: data.sach.nhaxuatban.tennxb, sachs:data.sach }); }); } } onSave = (e) => { var { ten } = this.state; e.preventDefault(); var { id } = this.props.params; console.log(this.props) if (id) { callApi("api/sach", 'PUT', { _id: id, ten: ten, }) } } render() { var { _id, ten, hinh, gia , sachs , namxuatban, noidung,giamgia,tentheloai,tennxb} = this.state; return (
